heading: Diablo 4 Season 9 Compendium â€“ Season Launch Updates & New Guides
content: Season 9: Sins of the Horadrim is (almost) here and the is excited to release our massive Season 9 Compendium. It has a ton of Leveling and End Game Build updates containing the new along with new and updated Resource Posts. This is just the beginning as we will keep updating content as the Season 9: Sins of the Horadrim reveal its secrets! Finally, all of our have been updated. You can use our search bar to find any , Side Quest, Dungeon, or other Resources. So many things to talk about! Let's dive in and see everything on offer for Season 8! Don't know what playstyle you're looking for? See the lists below to choose your class and embark on an adventure. They are great in helping assist you along the way. We'll be testing these builds and making adjustments where required, along with creating new builds throughout the Season! It wouldn't be a Season 9 Compendium update without Tier List updates! Tier Lists are a great way to see how different builds and classes stack up against each other in various parts of the game. The Endgame Build Tier List is particularly good at finding a good build for all activities, including Nightmare Dungeons. The new Bossing Tier List is good for determining what builds will take you into the furthest depths of and get those coveted Click the images below to check out our new class tier lists. Each of the builds are ranked the same as on our main tier list, so for example, there is no S tier for the Sorcerer Endgame and Pit Push tier list because none of those builds are in S tier currently. D4Planner will be updated as soon as possible with all the datas from 2.3.0 Patch! You can now experiment and share your builds using all the new Uniques as well as seasonal Boss Powers! With the new Season comes new Season specific guides along with an absolute ton of Resource Guide updates. Many of these will be expanded on once the Season goes live, and we can see the full Battle Pass and Journey, etc. With the new season, a lot of excitement is waiting for us. Many of our Diablo Team members will be streaming at the season's start. Below you will find links to their stream, so you can watch and learn along with them. We hope you enjoy the Sins of the Horadrim Season with the aid of our Season 9 compendium update. Our focus for the start of Season 9 is to make sure our are solid with all the new Item updates, new features and mechanic changes. We're continuing to work on more updates for If you haven't already, head over to our to stay up to date with our content development. Written by: Contributions by:

heading: Season and Resource Guides
content: It wouldn't be a Season 9 Compendium update without Tier List updates! Tier Lists are a great way to see how different builds and classes stack up against each other in various parts of the game. The Endgame Build Tier List is particularly good at finding a good build for all activities, including Nightmare Dungeons. The new Bossing Tier List is good for determining what builds will take you into the furthest depths of and get those coveted Click the images below to check out our new class tier lists. Each of the builds are ranked the same as on our main tier list, so for example, there is no S tier for the Sorcerer Endgame and Pit Push tier list because none of those builds are in S tier currently. D4Planner will be updated as soon as possible with all the datas from 2.3.0 Patch! You can now experiment and share your builds using all the new Uniques as well as seasonal Boss Powers! With the new Season comes new Season specific guides along with an absolute ton of Resource Guide updates. Many of these will be expanded on once the Season goes live, and we can see the full Battle Pass and Journey, etc. With the new season, a lot of excitement is waiting for us. Many of our Diablo Team members will be streaming at the season's start. Below you will find links to their stream, so you can watch and learn along with them. We hope you enjoy the Sins of the Horadrim Season with the aid of our Season 9 compendium update. Our focus for the start of Season 9 is to make sure our are solid with all the new Item updates, new features and mechanic changes. We're continuing to work on more updates for If you haven't already, head over to our to stay up to date with our content development. Written by: Contributions by:
